title: Human Pathology
description: The course provides a comprehensive overview of clinical human anatomic pathology. The course will focus on select diseases and their etiologies, pathogenesis, morphological changes, and clinical manifestations.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOS 3753 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or APPH 3753 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 3753 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
